title: 08/14: Running Backs Preview (Part Two) (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Taking a deeper look at the position by going through ADP. We begin with the middle of Round 2 and guys like Christian McCaffrey, Jordan Howard, Joe Mixon, Derrick Henry, Devonta Freeman, etc. and we make our way down to Round 10, covering about 40 RBs on today's show ... Spending a lot of time on the RBs drafted in Rounds 5 and 6 (30:32) including a number of rookies, Lamar Miller, Mark Ingram and Dion Lewis ... Getting into the Kerryon Johnson hype (41:00), Rex Burkhead's role, pass-catching specialists and more. Also, a look at schedules (52:50), a few fun RB stats (54:15) and the importance of handcuffing () ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
